mapper.sql: USERCODE, USERPWD, USERNAME, USERTEL, USEREMAIL, USERDEPART, MUSER, MDATE, MTIME, EATTRIBUTE1, USERSTAT, LOGINRES, LOGINDATE, LOGINTIME

from TBLUSER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TBLUSER (USERCODE, USERPWD, USERNAME, USERTEL, USEREMAIL, USERDEPART, MUSER, MDATE, MTIME, EATTRIBUTE1, USERSTAT, LOGINRES, LOGINDATE, LOGINTIME) values (#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userdepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mtime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eattribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userstat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logindate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{logintime,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
